title: Find Last Numeric Character in String
description:
FINDB_NUM searches STR from right to left and returns the
last position that is a number.
Numbers are the letters "0..9" and "."
name: FINDB_NUM

input.name: str
input.description: Input variable of type STRING with a specified length.

output.name: FINDB_NUM
output.description: The position of the last numeric character or period in the input string, or 0 if none exists.

return_value.description: The return value indicates the position of the last numeric character or period found in the string.
